base¶

class data_importer.base.BaseImporter(source=None)[source]¶

Base Importer method to create simples importes CSV files.

set_reader: can be override to create new importers files

class Meta¶

Importer configurations

BaseImporter.cache(value, obj=None)[source]¶

TODO: not implemented

BaseImporter.clean()[source]¶

Custom clean method

BaseImporter.cleaned_data[source]¶

Return tupla with data cleaned

BaseImporter.errors[source]¶

Show errors catch by clean_ methods

BaseImporter.is_valid()[source]¶

Clear content and return False if not have errors

BaseImporter.meta[source]¶

Is same to use .Meta

BaseImporter.post_clean()[source]¶

Excuted after all clean method

BaseImporter.pre_clean()[source]¶

Executed before all clean methods Important: pre_clean dont have cleaned_data content

BaseImporter.save(instance=None)[source]¶
BaseImporter.set_reader()[source]¶

Method responsable to convert file content into a list with same values that have fields

fields: [‘myfield1’, ‘myfield2’]

response: [[‘value_myfield1’, ‘value_myfield2’],
[‘value2_myfield1’, ‘value2_myfield2’]]
BaseImporter.source[source]¶

Return source opened

BaseImporter.start_fields()[source]¶

Initial function to find fields or headers values. This values will be used on process to clean_ and save method

If this method not have fields and have Meta.model this method will use model fields to populate content without id

data_importer.base.objclass2dict(objclass)[source]¶

Meta is a objclass on python 2.7 and no have __dict__ attribute.

This method convert one objclass to one lazy dict without AttributeError
